Uses of Class
WiFi_data.WiFi_Scan

  • Packages that use WiFi_Scan 
    Package Description
    Algorithms

    WiFi_data  

    • Uses of WiFi_Scan in Algorithms

      Methods in Algorithms with parameters of type WiFi_Scan 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Weighted_WiFi_Scan> WiFi_Scan_approx_location.compute_correlation(WiFi_Scan curr, WiFi_Scans db)
      This function scan the list of WiFi_Scans and for each one computes its resembles (correlation) to a given current WiFi_Scan - the List is then being sorted according to the weight.
      static double WiFi_Scan_approx_location.correlation(WiFi_Scan curr, WiFi_Scan db_record)
      This function computes the correlation between two WiFi Scan (curr, db): for each AP in curr, look for the same AP in db: if exists, compute the signal diff + some constant (MIN_DB_ERR), if not assume 100 db diff (NO_AP_DB_DIFF).
      static double WiFi_Scan_approx_location.diff(WiFi_AP curr, WiFi_Scan db)

    • Uses of WiFi_Scan in Tools

      Subclasses of WiFi_Scan in Tools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Weighted_WiFi_Scan
      This class represents a simple weight addition to the regular WiFi_Scan - so it can be sorted according to a correlation of a given WiFi_Scan - in order to implement Algorithm#2 of Ex2 - OOP Course Ariel University 2017-2018.
